# limel-linear-progress



<!-- Auto Generated Below -->


## Properties

| Property        | Attribute       | Description                                                   | Type      |
| --------------- | --------------- | ------------------------------------------------------------- | --------- |
| `indeterminate` | `indeterminate` | Puts the progress bar in an indeterminate state               | `boolean` |
| `value`         | `value`         | The value of the progress bar. Should be between `0` and `1`. | `number`  |
